wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I had a look at the Silverlight Dynamic Language SDK with respect to managed jscript and noticed two things: a) source code is not provided while it is for IronRuby and IronPython b) its only supported on Silverlight
Given this background I have the following questions: a) Will the source code to managed jscript be provided as per IronPython and IronRuby b) Will it be supported on WPF? c) Is there a Microsoft blogger or PM in charge of the managed jscript on the DLR functionality (so I can stop bothering you with inane questions ;^)
